title: Rammus really needs a rework.
body: So taric and yorick got a rework. Their art was old. And rammus's art is old too! REWORK RAMMUS!

replies.body:
Nokay

Rammus got a splash update not long back and his gameplay is still solid.

> [{quoted}](name=CHEESYLEEKS,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=OVlmuq6J,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-27T07:05:27.376+0000)
>
> Nokay
> 
> Rammus got a splash update not long back and his gameplay is still solid.

Maybe he meant in-game design?

What would you suggest? 

I'm not sure how they could improve his animations and models since they are as good as they can be for how subtle they are. I'm pretty sure he got improved textures not too long ago which look great, not to mention how awesome some of his skins are towards changing the overall feel of the champ. Further, I think that Rammus's design captures how silly parts of League were when it was first released and so ties together the evolving style the game has had over the years.
